name: CAPIMVEST
goal:
Capimvest aims to support market infrastructure, central banks and their members on large European projects and regulatory changes.

Capimvest offers consultancy services and develops tools to deliver on its mission.
interests: Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union
euInitiatives: All financial market related regulations as well as the development measures for start ups, the digitalisation for financial firms, the better regulation agenda.
